amendatorysection.catchline: Registration fees; fees for Aquatic Invasive Species Program; remitted to commission; when; form; duplicate copy.
amendatorysection.para: All registration fees and fees for the Aquatic Invasive Species Program received by the county treasurers shall be remitted on or before the thirtieth day of the following month to the secretary of the commission. All remittances shall be upon a form to be furnished by the commission and a duplicate copy shall be retained by the county treasurer.
